fullText:
Inexorable Pursuit

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite: 11th level, avenger, Censure of Pursuit class feature, oath of enmity power
Benefit: When you charge your oath of enmity target, you can ignore difficult terrain and move through enemies’ spaces during the charge.

Published in Player's Handbook 2, page(s) 191.
name: Inexorable Pursuit

benefit: When you charge your oath of enmity target, you can ignore difficult terrain and move through enemies’ spaces during the charge.
